1.Title: Drill Formations
1.Description: When the guard boars launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>, Lucy recovers 2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 15s, with each guard boar having its own separate cooldown.
1.Lore:
"Grassy, eyes right! ...That's left, you idiot!!!"
One command, two directions, three cries of pain, and wails all around.

2.Title: Little Boar Captain
2.Description: When Lucy uses a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, it grants all squad members and Bangboo, and the guard boars themselves the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status for 10s.
2.Lore:
"Without a doubt, Captain Lucy is the best leader of the Calydon Boar Thirens!"
This was Woody's conclusion in the "Sons of Calydon Annual Report."

3.Title: Ironfist Overseer
3.Lore:
"I just wish Captain Lucy would be more gentle when she's smacking us around."
Woody thought, but didn't dare say it out loud.

4.Title: Chaos Ball Game
4.Description: While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state, allies' CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 10%.
4.Lore: Rules and ribs are made to be broken.

5.Title: Wildland Princess
5.Lore:
She speaks politely to opponents screaming under her bat.
She apologizes to enemies groveling at her feet.
This is the perfect etiquette of a noble lady.

6.Title: Fierce Fangs of Fire
6.Description: When another squad member in the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state hits an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, a guard boar will drop from the sky and cause an explosion, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to 300% of the guard boar's ATK. This will extend the duration of the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> buff for all squad members and Bangboo, and for the guard boars themselves by 5s. The duration can increase up to 3 times, with a maximum duration of 30s. Refreshing the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> state resets the stack count. After the guard boar's explosion, it will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color>.
6.Lore:
The little boar Thirens known as the Crimson Mane Guard are always at the forefront of battle!
Though it's hard to tell if, at the moment they're launched by the bat, they feel total despair or just accept their fate.
Brave little boars, leading the charge!

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Batter Up!
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction or is a <color=#FFFFFF>Rupture</color> character:
The guard boars inherit Lucy's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

115100001.Title: Basic Attack: Lady's Bat
115100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Strike forward up to 4 times, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When Lucy uses her fourth <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the currently on-field guard boars will launch <color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</color> together.

115100002.Title: Guard Boars: To Arms!
115100002.Description: In combat, the guard boars will randomly use a baseball bat, boxing gloves, or a slingshot to automatically attack enemies, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

115100003.Title: Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!
115100003.Description: When Lucy uses the fourth <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, or when she gains the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status, the guard boars will whirl their baseball bats in a continuous motion, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> to nearby enemies. If the attack cannot be executed immediately, the guard boars will remember the required number of times to execute it.

115100004.Title: Special Attack: Solid Hit!
115100004.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

115100005.Title: EX Special Attack: Home Run!
115100005.Description:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.
With enough Energy, hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Recall a guard boar and launch it as a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color>. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

115100006.Title: Cheer On!
115100006.Description: After using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, when a guard boar triggers an explosion, it will apply the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status to all squad members and Bangboo, and the guard boars themselves. While under the <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status, allies' ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:13+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.8,1,2}%</color> of Lucy's initial ATK + <color=#2BAD00>{CAL:40+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*4,1,2}</color>, up to a maximum of 600. The <color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</color> status lasts for 10s when a <color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</color> is hit, and 15s when a <color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</color> is hit. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

115100007.Title: Dodge: Foul Ball!
115100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

115100008.Title: Dash Attack: Fearless Boar!
115100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during dodge to activate:
Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

115100009.Title: Dodge Counter: Returning Tusk!
115100009.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Perfect Dodge to activate:
Strike enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

115100010.Title: Chain Attack: Grand Slam!
115100010.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Lucy jumps up and sends a guard boar at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

115100011.Title: Ultimate: Walk-Off Home Run!
115100011.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch all guard boars sequentially, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> in a large area to enemies ahead.
While using this skill, other squad members recover 10 energy, and the next character to switch in gains an additional 20 energy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>.

115100013.Title: Quick Assist: Hit By Pitch!
115100013.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

115100014.Title: Defensive Assist: Safe on Base!
115100014.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

115100015.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Scored a Run!
115100015.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
